polynomial

Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • polynomial.Polynomial
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SquarePolynomial

    public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polynomial(int[] input) 
                Creates an object using the array of coefficients input.
      Polynomial(java.lang.String input) 
                Creates the object from a string representation of the polynomial input. For example: "12x^2-2x^1-42x^0"

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Polynomial add(Polynomial p) 
                Returns the polynomial that is the sum of this and p
      void changeSign() 
                Changes the sign of all coefficients of the polynomial
      Polynomial clone() 
                Creates a copy of the object
      Polynomial divide(Polynomial divisor) 
                Returns the quotient of the division of this Polynomial by divisor
      boolean equals(Polynomial to) 
                Compares the specified Polynomial with this for equality
      double getNum(int pow) 
                Returns a factor corresponding to the degree pow
      int maxPow() 
                Returns the maximum degree of the polynomial
      Polynomial mod(Polynomial divisor) 
                Returns the remainder of the division of this Polynomial by divisor
      Polynomial multipy(Polynomial multiplier) 
                Returns the polynomial, which is a product of this and divisor polynomials
      Polynomial subtract(Polynomial p) 
                Returns the polynomial, which is the difference between this and p polynomials
      java.lang.String toString() 
                Returns a string representation of this Polynomial

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
